{{flavour|A long pole with an enormous, cleaving blade on one end.}}

{{crawlquote|This weapon falls into the '[[Polearms]]' category. It is a two handed weapon.}}

The '''bardiche''' is the largest, slowest, and most powerful polearm available. Unfortunately, they are rare weapons, require two hands to wield, and a whopping 24 Polearms skill to reach minimum delay.

As a chopping weapon, it'll cut off [[hydra]] heads. It is also too large for [[kobold]]s and [[spriggan]]s to use at all.

==Strategy==
Other than [[Trog]] and [[Okawaru]] gifts, bardiches can occasionally be found in the [[Elven_Halls#Elf:2 - The Hall of Blades|Hall of Blades]], or in the [[Pandemonium]] (from [[list of demonspawn|demonspawn]] opponents).
